name: AdswizzSDKPrivacyDataIDFA
summary: Requester implementation for the tracking (IDFA) system permission
description:
AdswizzSDKPrivacyDataIDFA is an optional framework which provides support for the tracking system permission.
See Apple's document on user privacy for details of available authorisations at https://developer.apple.com/documentation/uikit/core_app/protecting_the_user_s_privacy
